title: A Survey of TinyML Applications in Beekeeping for Hive Monitoring and Management
summary: This paper surveys TinyML applications for hive monitoring and management in beekeeping, addressing challenges of traditional inspections and remote apiaries. It highlights the use of IoT and TinyML for low-power, real-time monitoring on edge devices.
